function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate PPE for wastewater sampling personnel","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to viruses and other contaminants, leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Ensure that personnel wear appropriate PPE, including specialized equipment for protection against waterborne pathogens","Technologies":"Specialized PPE for waterborne pathogen protection, such as full-body suits and waterproof gloves","People":"Wastewater sampling personnel","Owner":"Health and safety department or management"},{"Description":"Contaminated samples during transport and storage","Impact":"Risk of cross-contamination and exposure to infectious agents, compromising laboratory safety and public health","Mitigation":"Implement strict sample handling protocols, including secure packaging and temperature monitoring during transport and storage","Technologies":"Temperature-controlled sample transport containers and tracking devices","People":"Laboratory staff, public health officials","Owner":"Laboratory management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate RNA extraction protocols","Impact":"Potential incomplete or inaccurate analysis of viral content, leading to misinterpretation of disease prevalence and transmission risk","Mitigation":"Establish standardized and validated RNA extraction methods, and ensure proper training of laboratory personnel","Technologies":"Automated RNA extraction systems, standardized extraction kits","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management, research institutions"}]}
